#include <iostream>
#include <stdio.h>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
    long long int t,n,x,y,ans;
    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--){
      scanf("%lld",&n);
      if(n%2==0){
      x=n/2;
      ans=x*x-2*(x*(x+1)/2);
      printf("%lld\n",ans);
      }
      else{
      x=(n/2)+1;
      y=x-1;
      ans=x*x-2*(y*(y+1)/2);
      printf("%lld\n",ans);
      }

      }




    return 0;
}
